initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Plezzel?
Plezzel is very useful to people when it comes to marketing automation, sending personalized emails, user friendly, easy to use the software with budgeting, social media engagement.

What do you dislike about Plezzel?
Plezzel should offer customer support that includes Phone answering services, Live chat support and Email customer service support.Plezzel does not offer a free trial.

Recommendations to others considering Plezzel:
Kindly consider using Plezzel because if you're looking for a marketing automation this one is the best. It is industry-leader with a well tested and well known software platform. Easy to use.

What problems is Plezzel solving and how is that benefiting you?
The business problems that Plezzel solve are sending personalized emails, automated email response, manage email deliverabilty, sending outbound emails, offers advance marketing automation.

initial_reviews.review_title: A great digital marketing platform for business
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Plezzel?
Plazzel has various features to help users manage their online activities like email marketing, lead generation and social media management.

What do you dislike about Plezzel?
Sometimes technical issues feel like glitches. But it rarely happens.

What problems is Plezzel solving and how is that benefiting you?
Having all the tools in one place is very handy and efficient when it comes to online activity management. Mostly while working on Social Accounts for marketing or advertising then it helps a lot.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Plezzel?
it has very lovely segmentation and also investor, seller and buyer grouping, which helps to target them in a future opportunity

What do you dislike about Plezzel?
Analytic-related features not having multiple models

What problems is Plezzel solving and how is that benefiting you?
Selling the property and investing in the right ;ocation

initial_reviews.review_title: It was easy to use and very straightforward
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Plezzel?
I like the fact that it guides you to where to go or what steps to follow when sorting out queries

What do you dislike about Plezzel?
If it is locked, then you have to wait for a while to have it fixed

What problems is Plezzel solving and how is that benefiting you?
Market-related problems. It empowers business owners to take charge of their business growth with easy-to-use technology to make marketing easy and effective.
